ygData.subject: Re: Fourth of July
ygData.msgSnippet: Canada was actually a French colony until the French & Indian War when England easily beat the French (surprise, surprise). And the US remained weak militarily

Canada was actually a French colony until the French & Indian War when 
England easily beat the French (surprise, surprise).

And the US remained weak militarily speaking for a while, from 1776-1812+.  
And the only reason France helped the US in the Revolution was because they 
wanted to weaken England, the King of France didn't particularly care about 
the revolutionaries.  Hell, America was for the revolutionaries in France 
that executed the very King who had aided America.
